      • getNewFile

        public static java.io.File getNewFile(java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String file_name)
        Create a unused filename. The path and file_name are used as a base.
        Parameters:
        path - a file path
        file_name - a file name
        Returns:
        a file which does not exist in the file system.
